bibl.title: The Fayoum Survey Project: The Themistou Meris. Volume A. The Archaeological and Papyrological Survey

series.title: Collectanea Hellenistica - KVAB [Koninklijke Vlaamse Academie van België voor Wetenschappen en Kunsten, Comité Klassieke Studies, Subcomité Hellenisme]

bibl.note: Preface. - 1. The Themistou Meris. Its borders, landscape and villages. - Surveyed places in the Themistou meris. The Southern border of the meris at the dam between Itsa and Abou el-Nour: 2. Itsa = Lysimachis? Appendix: Abgig = ?; - 3. Abou el-Nour = Arsinoe on the Dyke / on the Lock. - Downstream the Wadi Nazlah, from South to North: 4. Minyet el-Heita = Trikomia?; - 5. Abou Gandir = Lagis?; - 6. Nazlah = ?; - 7. The "Wilkinson Wall" in the Wadi Nazlah, below the cemetery of Qasr el-Gabali. - On the Eastern Bank of the Wadi Nazlah, from South to North: 8. Kom el-Arka = ?; - 9. Tell el-Kinissa = ? - Downstream the Bahr Qasr el-Banât: from South to North, up to Theadelpheia: 10. Kom Alioun = Hermopolis or Theoxenis?; - 11. Kom Hamouli, site of the monastery of the Archangel Michael; - 12. Kharâbat Sha'lân = Haráb-t-el-Yahood ("The Ruins of the Jews") = Polydeukeia (or Sentrempais)? - 13. Batn Harit = Theadelpheia. - Further Downstream the Bahr Qasr el-Banât: from East to West, from Euhemeria to Medinet Qouta: 14. Qasr el-Banât = Euhemeria; - 15. The "ruins" North-East of Philoteris = Kanopias (?); - 16. Medinet Watfa = Philoteris; - 17. Τὰ Xαλκωρύχια, the copper mines, in the area of Dionysias; - 18. Qasr Qaroun = Dionysias; - 19. Medinet Qouta = Ha, Lord of the West = ? - Villages on the plateau between Medinet el-Fayoum and its fringes: 20. Fedemin = Psentymis; - 21. Villages having disappeared under fields or cemeteries. - Villages on the Northern fringe of the central Fayoum plateau; from West to East: 22. Ibshaway = Pisais; - 23. Abou Ksa = Herakleia (?); - 24. Sanhour = Apias? and Tersa. - Ancient villages along the shore of Lake Qaroun in the Themistou Meris, from East to West: 25. Khashm az-Zinah and El Hammâm = Berenikis Aigialou and Alexandrou Nesos; - 26. Sanhour el-Baharia ("North Sanhour"); - 27. Ἁλμυρᾶς; - 28. The "Ruins of an Ancient Village" = Minyet Aqnā?; - 29. Ezbet Abd el-Qâdir Ibrahim = Ezbet el-Kharaba = Ezbet Quwayda = ?; - 30. The Monastery of St. Macarius of Alexandria in the Wadi Rayan. - Appendix I: The geomorphology and geo-archaeology of Philoteris / Watfa (I. Klose); - Appendix II: Canals, Wells and Basins: Excavations in Philoteris / Watfa in 2012 and 2014 (P. Kopp). - Bibliography. Indices. Maps.
bibl.seg: Cornelia Römer, with contributions by F. Hamouda, I. Klose & P. Kopp, The Fayoum Survey Project: The Themistou Meris. Volume A. The Archaeological and Papyrological Survey = Collectanea Hellenistica. VIII.
Leuven - Paris - Bristol, CT, Peeters, 2019, x-398 pp., figg. ISBN 978-90-429-3627-0. €102.
